sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { LoginservisService } from '../servisi/loginservis.service'; import { Nastavnik } from '../models/nastavnik'; import { Cas } from '../models/cas'; import { Helper } from '../models/helper'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nastavnik', templateUrl: './nastavnik.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nastavnik.component.css'] }) export class NastavnikComponent { constructor(private servis : LoginservisService, private router : Router ) {} where : number = 1 username : string = "nastavnik3" nastavnik : Nastavnik = new Nastavnik() edited : Nastavnik = new Nastavnik() selectedAges: string[] = []; casthree : Cas[] = [] firstFiveElements: Cas[] = [] casovizapotvrdu : Cas[] = [] casovizaucenike : Cas[] = [] ucenici : string[] = [] ucenicinodupes : string[] = [] helper : Helper[] = [] ngOnInit(){ this.where = 1 this.username = "nastavnik3" this.servis.getnastavnik(this.username).subscribe(nst=>{ this.nastavnik = nst }) this.selectedAges = [] this.edited = new Nastavnik() this.servis.getpotvrda(this.username).subscribe(casovi =>{ this.casovizapotvrdu = casovi }) this.servis.getthree(this.username).subscribe(casovi =>{ this.casthree = casovi }) this.servis.getsvojeucenike(this.username).subscribe(casovi=>{ this.casovizaucenike = casovi for (let cas of this.casovizaucenike){ this.ucenici.push(cas.ucenik) } this.ucenicinodupes = Array.from(new Set(this.ucenici)) for (let ucenik of this.ucenicinodupes){ let hlp = new Helper() hlp.ucenik = ucenik this.helper.push(hlp) } }) } getAll(name : Helper){ if(name.toggle){ name.toggle = 0 }else{ name.toggle = 1 } } changeWhere(b : number){ this.where = b; if(b == 3){ for(let hlp of this.helper){ this.servis.getdosije(hlp.ucenik,this.username).subscribe(casovi=>{ hlp.casovi = casovi }) } } } saveChanges(){ this.edited.username = this.nastavnik.username if(this.edited.name === "")this.edited.name = this.nastavnik.name if(this.edited.surname === "")this.edited.surname = this.nastavnik.surname if(this.edited.adress === "")this.edited.adress = this.nastavnik.adress if(this.edited.email === "")this.edited.email = this.nastavnik.email if(this.edited.telephone === 0)this.edited.telephone = this.nastavnik.telephone this.edited.predmeti = this.nastavnik.predmeti if(this.selectedAges.length === 0){ this.edited.razredi = this.nastavnik.razredi }else{ this.edited.razredi = this.selectedAges } this.servis.updatenastavnik(this.edited).subscribe(data=>{ }) this.servis.getnastavnik(this.username).subscribe(nst=>{ this.nastavnik = nst }) } toggleAge(age: string) { if (this.selectedAges.includes(age)) { this.selectedAges = this.selectedAges.filter(item => item !== age); } else { // Dodaj uzrast ako ne postoji u nizu this.selectedAges.push(age); } } prihvatiCas(datum : Date){ this.servis.potvrdiCas(datum,this.username,1).subscribe(data =>{ alert(data.message) }) this.servis.getpotvrda(this.username).subscribe(casovi =>{ this.casovizapotvrdu = casovi }) this.servis.getthree(this.username).subscribe(casovi =>{ this.casthree = casovi }) } odbijCas(datum : Date){ this.servis.potvrdiCas(datum,this.username,2).subscribe(data =>{ alert(data.message) }) this.servis.getpotvrda(this.username).subscribe(casovi =>{ this.casovizapotvrdu = casovi }) this.servis.getthree(this.username).subscribe(casovi =>{ this.casthree = casovi }) } odrziCas(datum : Date){ this.servis.odrziCas(datum,this.username,1).subscribe(data =>{ alert(data.message) }) this.servis.getpotvrda(this.username).subscribe(casovi =>{ this.casovizapotvrdu = casovi }) this.servis.getthree(this.username).subscribe(casovi =>{ this.casthree = casovi }) } LogOut(){ localStorage.clear this.router.navigate(['']) } }
